corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: You should inspect your mail to determine the outcome of the module transfer .

The DHS report describes the three methods currently used by customs officials to inspect the trucks : a Radiation Portal Monitor to detect the presence of radiation , a Vehicle and Cargo Inspection System screening that creates an image similar to an X-ray , and physical inspections .
